Captain Willard is an officer of the intelligence services of the U.S. military who has been charged, in Cambodia, a dangerous mission to move upstream to eliminate Kurtz, a renegade American colonel gone mad. Deep in the jungle, in a camp strewn with rotting corpses and severed heads, the huge, enigmatic figure of Kurtz despotic leader as a Buddha on Montagnard tribesmen, who worship him as a god.
